channel.title: Comments on: Interview with Justin Fox

item.title: By: Mignon
item.dc:creator: Mignon
item.description: Good insight for wanna-be travel writers. Especially the last answer.
item.content:encoded: Good insight for wanna-be travel writers. Especially the last answer.

item.title: By: Leanne
item.dc:creator: Leanne
item.description: Great interview and great questions. Maybe you could fill one out for yourself? I'd love to hear your favorite (I'm American) places you've been, etc...
item.content:encoded: Great interview and great questions. Maybe you could fill one out for yourself? I’d love to hear your favorite (I’m American) places you’ve been, etc…
